title: QA Engineer/ Junior Developer
description:
**QA Engineer/ Junior Developer**
---------------------------------

**About the Role**

  

We’re on the hunt for a motivated and detail-obsessed **QA Engineer** to join our team! You’ll be key in ensuring top-notch quality across our projects while contributing to the development of internal tools that supercharge and automate processes for game development.


This is your chance to dive into a variety of projects, collaborate with a passionate team, and grow in a role that values curiosity, adaptability, and learning. If you love problem-solving, thrive in a fast-paced environment, and enjoy working with awesome people—let’s talk!

**What You’ll Be Doing:**

* **Testing & QA**: Hunt down bugs and ensure everything works like a dream across game features, tools, and systems.
* ️ **Internal Tools Development**: Help build and maintain tools that automate workflows and make game development smoother.
* **Game Engine Collaboration**: Partner with the game dev team to test and improve engine-related tools.
* **Project Agility**: Jump into different projects and adapt quickly to changing priorities.
* **Detail-Driven Testing**: Catch the smallest issues with your eagle eye for detail.
* **Communication**: Work seamlessly with developers, designers, and the rest of the team to share insights and solutions.
* **Keep Growing**: Stay curious and continue learning to level up in your role.

**What We’re Looking For:**

* **Hands-On Experience**: Some experience in software development, particularly with internal tools or automation. (You don’t need to be a coding wizard, but confidence in diving into tasks is key!)
* **Adaptability**: Comfortable jumping between projects and figuring out new things on the fly.
* **Attention to Detail**: You’re the kind of person who spots the one pixel that’s out of place.
* **Great Communicator**: Easy to work with, clear in your communication, and a real team player.
* **Growth Mindset**: You love learning and are eager to tackle new challenges.
* **Remote-Ready**: You’re disciplined, flexible, and know how to thrive in a remote work environment.

**Bonus Skills (Nice to Have):**

* Familiarity with game engines
* ️ Experience in QA testing, debugging, or automation.
* ️ Basic programming skills
* Understanding of game development pipelines and workflows.

**What’s in It for You?**

* **Work Anywhere**: Fully remote role, giving you the freedom to work from anywhere within the EU.
* **Growth Opportunities**: Learn and develop your skills in a supportive environment.
* **Exciting Projects**: Be part of a fast-paced, dynamic team working on cool projects.
* **Great Team Culture**: Join a fun, friendly, and collaborative team that values communication and mutual respect.
* **Competitive Salary**: Your pay will match your experience and expertise.

**How to Apply:**  

If this sounds like your dream role, we’d love to hear from you! Send your **CV** and a quick note about why you’d be a great fit to the team!  

  

We can’t wait to meet you!

title: Mjukvaruutvecklare med erfarenhet till Saab Aeronautics
description:
**Saab söker nu en driven mjukvaruutvecklare med kunskap inom radiosystem och kommunikation. Här får du möjlighet att arbeta i en spännande och utmanande roll där du kan utnyttja och vidareutveckla din kompetens.**

### **Om rollen**


I rollen som mjukvaruutvecklare kommer du att arbeta med att utveckla och integrera mjukvara för avancerade kommunikationssystem kopplade till Gripen C/D. Arbetet omfattar talkommunikation för både civila luftrummet och militär stridsledning, utveckling av taktiska datalänkar för att skapa en omvärldsbild samt lösningar för markkommunikation mellan flygplan och tekniker. Du kommer även få vara med och ta fram testkod och utföra tester i avancerade testriggar där hårdvara ingår i processen.


Du blir en del av ett erfaret team som hanterar flera pågående projekt och arbetar för att möta högt ställda kundkrav samt civila och NATO-standarder. Det är en dynamisk miljö med stor möjlighet till lärande och teknisk utveckling.


Rollen är placerad i Linköping.

### **Att vara konsult på Nexer**


Som senior konsult hos Nexer blir du en del av ett nätverk av erfarna specialister. Du kommer att vara anställd av Nexer Tech Talent och arbeta som konsult hos Saab Aeronautics i Linköping med start i mars.


Vi stöttar dig genom hela uppdraget och erbjuder möjligheter att delta i nätverksträffar, inspirerande föreläsningar och sociala aktiviteter. Du kan också bidra som mentor för juniora kollegor, där din erfarenhet och expertis hjälper till att stärka hela teamet.

### **Vi söker dig som:**

* Har gedigen erfarenhet inom mjukvaruutveckling och en relevant akademisk examen.
* Har ett intresse för radiosystem och kommunikationslösningar.
* Är skicklig på att lösa problem och har erfarenhet av att arbeta i komplexa projekt.
* Är självgående, kommunikativ och bekväm med att samarbeta med olika intressenter.
* Har goda kunskaper i programmeringsspråk som C/C++, Python och erfarenhet av systemutveckling för hårdvarunära lösningar.

### **Ansökan**


Låter detta som en spännande möjlighet? Vi rekryterar löpande, så skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt. Om du har frågor, kontakta Tech Recruiter Olivia Holm på olivia.holm@nexergroup.com.


Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

### **Om Nexer**


Nexer Tech Talent är en del av Nexer Group – ett techbolag med djupa rötter i svenskt entreprenörskap och innovation. Med över 2 500 medarbetare i 15 länder och mer än 35 års erfarenhet hjälper vi våra kunder att ligga steget före strategiskt, teknologiskt och kommunikativt. Läs mer om Nexer Tech Talent här.

title: Senior Embeddedutvecklare National Security
description:
**Om Advenica**


Vi på Advenica arbetar för att skapa en säkrare värld. Våra produkter skyddar den allra viktigaste digitala informationen i vårt samhälle och bidrar till att vi kan leva våra liv så som vi vill. Vi hjälper företag, kritisk infrastruktur och demokratiska institutioner att fungera i en tid av ökande hotbild och attacker. Vi är stolta över att kunna bidra till Sveriges säkerhet och till upprätthållandet av demokratiska värderingar.

 **Om rollen**


Du kommer ingå i ett agilt team som arbetar med att ta fram vår nästa produkt inom cybersäkerhet på högsta nivå. Teamets medlemmar representerar olika discipliner och ni arbetar tillsammans för att säkerställa att produkten är och förblir världsledande när det gäller säker datakommunikation.


Teamet arbetar med hela processen från koncept/teknikstudier, utveckling, verifikation och dokumentation till färdig produkt. Ditt fokus är mjukvaran i produkten.


När du börjar utser vi en mentor som kommer att stötta dig via vårt onboarding-program för att du snabbt ska finna dig till rätta i din nya vardag.


Hos oss finns det stora möjligheter att utvecklas inom olika teknikområden och avancerad cybersäkerhet.  



**Om dig**

  

Du drivs av att bidra till utveckling i framkant och vill ha ett arbete som är meningsfullt. Du har några års erfarenhet som utvecklare och ett intresse för att utvecklas inom cybersäkerhet.


Du trivs i en kunskapsstark, men prestigelös organisation med teknikfokus, korta beslutsvägar och ett agilt förhållningssätt.


Du är en skicklig programmerare som har lätt för att se och skapa struktur. Nu vill du ta nästa steg i en miljö där du kan utvecklas och ta ansvar.


Vi ser gärna att du har erfarenhet av / har:

* god programmeringsvana i C, C++ och Python
* shellscripting i Linuxmiljö eller liknande
* utveckla och felsöka nätverksprotokoll

arbeta i projekt med agila arbetsmetoder som scrum och kanban.  
* 

  

På grund av vår verksamhet är tjänsten säkerhetsklassad. Det innebär att du behöver vara svensk medborgare och att en säkerhetsprövning kommer att genomföras innan anställning.

 **Om arbetsplatsen**


Hos Advenica uppmuntras personlig utveckling och du får stor frihet i ditt arbete. Stor vikt läggs vid att jobba proaktivt för att främja välmående och balans mellan arbete och fritid. Vårt kontor ligger centralt i Malmö med gångavstånd till det mesta du kan tänkas behöva. På Advenica finns en vi-känsla där vi stöttar och hjälper varandra. Vår attityd är att vi tillsammans gör skillnad och skapar resultat, oavsett var i organisationen du är.

 **Ort**  

Malmö

 **Sista ansökningsdatum**  

28 februari 2025

 **Kontaktperson**  

Har du frågor så hör av dig till vår rekryterare Katarina Nordengren Hansen:


katarina.nordengrenhansen@advenica.com

title: Fullstack Developer
description:
*Sebratec is a Software and Engineering company specializing in services for the tech industry. Our mission is to transform companies through software and embedded systems solutions, supporting customers with consultancy in the development of their products, as well as training for teams and individuals interested in technology.*


We are looking for **two Fullstack Developers** to join one of our key clients in the automotive industry. In this role, you will contribute to transforming traditional processes into cutting-edge technology solutions by building tools that enable the development of future vehicles.


We are seeking one developer with expertise in **Java** and another with expertise in **.NET**. Both roles will focus on backend development while contributing to the front-end side as needed. You will work on an in-house developed tool that plays a critical role in the client’s CI/CD and configuration management processes. Collaborating closely with end users, business analysts, and other teams, you will help deliver innovative, high-quality solutions in a dynamic, agile environment.

### **Your Role**

* Develop new features and functionalities following clean code principles and best practices.
* Apply a DevOps mindset and agile/scrum methodologies in daily work.
* Address requirements for features and actively participate in solution discussions within the team.
* Take ownership of the application, including its development, operations, and support.

### **Requirements & Qualifications**

**Must-have:**

* M.Sc. or B.Sc. in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
* At least 5 years of documented experience in backend development.
* Proficiency in:
	+ GIT, GitHub/Azure DevOps
	+ .NET, Visual Studio, C#, ASP .Net Core
	+ Java
	+ Entity Framework or NHibernate
	+ Kubernetes
	+ SQL knowledge

**Preferable:**

* Hands-on experience with Azure Cloud services (e.g., Azure Application Insights, Azure Databases).
* Experience working with distributed systems (microservices).
* Knowledge of Docker containers and Helm charts.
* Familiarity with working in a DevOps environment, including development and end-user support.

title: Senior Software Developer
description:
*Sebratec is a Software and Engineering company specializing in services for the tech industry. Our mission is to transform companies through software and embedded systems solutions, supporting customers with consultancy in the development of their products, as well as training for teams and individuals interested in technology.*


We are looking for a **Senior Software Engineer** to join one of our key clients in the automotive industry. You will play a vital role in developing an in-house simulator to test and validate autonomous drive (AD) and advanced driver assistance systems (ADAS). The tools you build will support the testing, verification, and validation of software, ensuring world-class safety and performance for future vehicles.

### **Your Role**

* Design and develop scalable, high-performance simulation tools using C++ and Python.
* Implement and optimize closed-loop simulation environments for AD/ADAS testing.
* Work with open standards such as OpenScenario, OpenDrive, and OSI.
* Collaborate in an agile SCRUM team to deliver features from concept to production.
* Ensure the simulator performs effectively across various scenarios.

#### **Qualifications:**

* M.Sc. in Physics, Automotive Engineering, Mechatronics, Computer Science, or a related field.
* Proven experience in closed-loop simulations and control theory.
* Strong proficiency in C++ and Python.
* Familiarity with OpenScenario, OpenDrive, and OSI standards (meritorious).
* Excellent problem-solving and communication skill


If you're ready to take on exciting challenges and grow your career in the automotive industry, apply today!

title: Developer with expertise in AI and automation
description:
**About Photowall**
-------------------


Photowall is a global market leader in custom wallpapers and wall décor. We were ranked among the top 3 most profitable e-commerce companies in Sweden in 2024. We deliver to over 20 markets, with an annual turnover exceeding 400 MSEK and ambitious plans for continued growth through geographic expansion and new products. We offer a fast-paced environment with ample opportunities for professional development.

**How you will take us to the next level**
------------------------------------------


You will work on the next version of Photowall's e-commerce platform, playing a key role in identifying and implementing opportunities for automation and AI solutions. You will actively work with advanced AI tools, automation, and proof-of-concepts to enhance and streamline Photowall's platform and processes. This role suits someone with both the technical skills and the drive to leverage AI to create value for both users and internal workflows. We are looking for someone who is motivated to explore and suggest solutions based on our business context and who has a strong interest in continuing to develop expertise in AI and machine learning. The role involves close collaboration with product owners, other developers, and UX designers to identify and implement the best solutions.

**Your strengths and talents**
------------------------------


We believe you have approximately five years of experience working on relevant development projects. Your primary interest is likely in AI and ML-related technologies, with a few years of professional experience in this field. Experience working in a cloud environment is required, with a preference for Google Cloud Platform (GCP).

 **Your background and experience:**

* At least 5 years of experience in web development.
* Experience with Google Cloud or equivalent cloud platforms.
* Proficiency in building, training, fine-tuning, and monitoring AI models using Google Cloud AI tools (Vertex AI, AutoML, TensorFlow, etc.).
* Experience with Hugging Face and open AI models.
* Ability to build APIs that can be utilized by other services.
* Solid experience with version control using GitHub.
* Experience with or interest in PHP.

**Extra skills we value:**

* Experience with SQL and data analysis, especially in BigQuery.
* Experience with AWS.
* E-commerce experience, including working with business data.
* Knowledge of A/B testing and conversion optimization.

title: DevOps Software Developer
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------

 **About this opportunity**  

Ericsson's Mobile Financial Services platform empowers financial freedom and convenience for millions of people around the world. We offer a configurable, as-a-service platform for mobile payments and financial services, tailored for service providers, banks, and enterprises. Together with our customers and partners, we build a future where financial services are accessible for anyone, anywhere, anytime.  

Are you our new colleague in MFS Operations? We need a driving person who is passionate at achieving results by teamwork in our rapidly growing business.  

We are looking for a Devops engineer to evolve and support our operations tools growing our automation.  

Ericsson Mobile Financial Services: Mobile Money and Fintech

 **What you will do**  

Your role will include a variation of different development activities such as requirement analysis, software design, integration, verification, and address issues related to Operations automation. We offer the possibility to have a high growth in your software developer role and technical leadership and being challenged in different roles.  

* Be part of MFS Operations team responsible to grow our automation. Our methodology is based on “Automate what can be automated”
* Work with customer driven development of a product
 **You will bring**  

The candidate enjoys working in teams with ability to lead and work in a multinational, multi-site, and cross-functional teams set-up. Additionally, we believe the candidate has good analytical and communication skills. High skills in oral and written English.  

* Education: Academic degree, minimum on bachelor level, in Software Engineering, Computer Science or similar
* Skills in software programming languages, i.e Java, JavaScript/TypeScript and Python as well as in industry standard frameworks like Java EE, OSGi, Angular etc.
* Hands-on experience with AWS, Azure, GCP, or private cloud solutions
* Experience with tools like Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, Azure DevOps, or similar platforms
* Expertise in Terraform, Ansible, Puppet, or Chef for automated infrastructure management
* Understanding of basic networking concepts, VPNs, load balancing, and firewalls
* Familiarity with tools like Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana), Splunk, or New Relic
* Knowledge of secure coding practices, vulnerability management, and compliance standards
 **Application**


We look forward to your application with CV in English. We target 60% work-from-office.  

Last day to apply: 31st of January 2025  

Please note that we do not accept, proceed, or respond for applications sent via e-mail.


If you have specific questions, you are welcome to contact Grace Bosson Werélius, Strategic Product Manager at grace.bosson.werelius@ericsson.com or Raheleh Rouhani, Sr. Recruiter at raheleh.rouhani@ericsson.com


Location: Karlskrona, Sweden

title: Senior Software Developer Mobile NW
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------


**About this opportunity:**


We are looking for curious and creative software developers to join our team and help build a product that millions of people use every day for one of our most profound needs as human beings – communication.


You will play an important part in our team of brilliant software developers, implementing new features, improving performance, and building elegant solutions for our customers.


We work with radio base stations, at the core of mobile communication, enablers of emerging technologies, such as 5G and IoT. Our products are involved in anything from streaming video, listening to music while on the move, to old-school voice communication like calling grandma.

 **What you will do:**

* Develop functionality in a complex system, enabling every day communication for millions of people around the globe.
* Collaborate closely with other developers.
* Write clear, maintainable code that will scale across a number of projects and distributed development teams that is released on many hardware platforms.
* Become a valued member of an autonomous, cross-functional team.
* Work from our awesome office in Gothenburg at the river waterfront

 **Design:** Participate in and lead the design of software solutions, ensuring architecture meets both current and future needs.  

**Requirements Analysis:** Analyze and interpret requirements to ensure that software solutions are aligned with business objectives.  

**Development:** Develop robust, efficient, and scalable software for embedded systems.  

**Testing:** Create and implement comprehensive test plans to ensure software reliability and performance.  

**CI/CD:** Implement and manage continuous integration and continuous deployment pipelines to streamline development and deployment processes.  

**Troubleshooting:** Diagnose, debug, and resolve complex software issues in both development and production environments.  

**Documentation:** Produce clear, concise documentation that supports development, maintenance, and user understanding of the software.

 **The skills you bring:**

* 5+ years of experience in embedded software development.
* **Proficiency in C++ and Java:** Capable of writing readable, maintainable code while adhering to established coding guidelines and workflows.
* **Quality Focus:** You understand what it means to ship high-quality code and are committed to excellence in software delivery.
* Strong understanding of system architecture and embedded systems principles.
* Experience with version control systems like Git.
* Familiarity with agile methodologies, including Scrum or Kanban.
* Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment, valuing team success over personal achievements.

  

You are a skilled developer with a passion for technology and software development. You are curious about new technologies and thrive in a fast-paced, agile environment.


We're not just looking for a developer; we need someone who can take on broader responsibilities and has expertise in design, testing, CI/CD, troubleshooting, and documentation. If you're passionate about contributing to all aspects of software development from conception to delivery, we want to hear from you.

  

We are based in Göteborg in the top modern facility at Lindholmen Science Park.  

Currently our office presence is 3 days a week, and 2 days working from home.

**Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.

title: Baseband Developer
description:
**Grow with us**
----------------

  

We are currently seeking young and curious professionals with 2+ years of industry experience who want to be part of Radio Baseband software development for 5G and 6G.

  

About this opportunity:

  

When joining at Ericsson you are empowered to learn, lead, and perform at your best, shaping the future of technology. This is a place where you're welcomed as your own perfectly unique self, and celebrated for the skills, talent, and perspective you bring to the team.

  

Together with your team you will be responsible from pre-study to customer acceptance for new functionality, together with maintenance of current products. The team systemizes, designs and tests the software and takes joint responsibility for all team tasks.

**Join our Team**
-----------------

  

What you will do:

  

Your focus will be in Physical layer (L1) parts of the Baseband SW, vital building blocks in our market leading 5G Radio Access Network (RAN) solution and in future within 6G. Together with your fellow baseband SW developers, you will:

* Build outstanding baseband software using C/C++, Python.
* Participate in the study, implementation, and verification of new 5G features and, in the near future, within 6G.
* Work in a multi-functional, multi-cultural environment with supportive teammates.

  

Join our Team

  

We’re excited to see you bring some or all of the following:

* A Master of Science degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, Wireless Communication, Electrical or Electronic Engineering or equivalent.
* 2 - 5 years of industry experience preferably within telecom or similar industry working with embedded software development.
* Curiosity, a desire, and skills to be a great embedded software developer with a special interest in the C/C++ programming language for real time systems.
* Knowledge and experience in 5G and 4G wireless communication e.g. 3GPP specifications.
* Experience with signal processing, RF or air interface measurements, multi-core DSP processor programming in areal-time environment and design patterns in an embedded environment.
* A forward-thinking, hardworking, and creative personality. We love extraordinary teammates who enjoy a fast-paced work environment and adopts challenge.
* Dedication and a genuine interest in the latest technology trends and a passion to solve complex problems no one else has solved before.

  

You have an open mind and like to take on new challenges to continuously improve, and to work outside your own field to broaden your competence and get a deeper understanding of our products.

  

We will proceed with the applications as they come so leave you application soonest!

  

Primary country and city: Sweden (SE) || Lund

title: Fullstack Developer in Quantum, Ai and Blockchain
description:
**Grow with us**
----------------

  

Ericsson is a world-leading provider of telecommunications equipment and services to mobile and fixed network operators. Over 1,000 networks in more than 180 countries use Ericsson equipment, and more than 40 percent of the world's mobile traffic passes through Ericsson networks. Using innovation to empower people, business and society, Ericsson is working towards the Networked Society: a world connected in real time that will open opportunities to create freedom, transform society and drive solutions to some of our planet’s greatest challenges.

  

Job Summary:

  

Are you looking for an opportunity to work on groundbreaking projects involving blockchain, AI, and quantum computing? Do you enjoy a collaborative and innovative environment fostering rapid prototyping and experimentation with access to advanced tools and platforms for cloud-native development? Are you into career growth opportunities in a tech-forward organization? If you said yes, we might have a position for you!

  

We are a team of altogether 17 people in Stockholm and Bangalore and are now seeking a dynamic and versatile Fullstack Developer to join our team in Stockholm Headquarters with expertise in developing scalable, cloud-native applications. The ideal candidate will have a passion for leveraging cutting-edge technologies like blockchain, AI, and quantum computing to drive rapid prototyping and innovation. This role demands a self-starter who thrives in a collaborative, Agile environment and can take ownership of end-to-end application development.

  

Key Responsibilities:  

* Fullstack Development: Build and maintain scalable web applications using Java, Spring Boot, and modern JavaScript frameworks (React/Angular).
* Blockchain Integration: Design and implement blockchain solutions, ensuring security, scalability, and performance.
* AI and Quantum Prototyping: Collaborate with AI and quantum computing teams to integrate intelligent and innovative solutions into applications.
* API Development: Develop RESTful and GraphQL APIs with secure and efficient authentication mechanisms, including PKI and certificate management.
* Cloud-Native Solutions: Build and deploy microservices using Docker, Kubernetes, Helm, and AWS-native services (API Gateway, Lambda, S3, RDS).
* Database Management: Design and optimize schemas, functions, and triggers for relational (MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle) and NoSQL (MongoDB, InfluxDB) databases.
* DevSecOps: Ensure secure coding practices and integrate security into the CI/CD pipeline using tools like GitLab and Jira.
* UI Development: Create responsive, user-friendly UIs using React JS, HTML5, and CSS3.
* Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment with project goals and deliver rapid prototypes for evolving business needs.
* Performance Optimization: Conduct code reviews, performance tuning, and troubleshooting to ensure high-quality, efficient applications.
**Join our Team**
-----------------

  

Required Qualifications:  

* Education: Minimum master’s degree in computer science, engineering, or a related field.
* Experience: 5+ years of hands-on experience in fullstack development.
* Languages & Frameworks: Proficiency in Java (Spring Boot, Spring Cloud), JavaScript (React, Angular) and Go Lang.
* Cloud Expertise: Hands-on experience with AWS cloud-native applications, serverless computing, and distributed systems (EKS, Kafka, Redis).
* Database Skills: Strong understanding of relational and NoSQL databases, with experience in schema design and performance tuning.
* Blockchain & AI: Familiarity with blockchain technologies (e.g., Ethereum, Hyperledger) and AI tools/frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch).
* Quantum Computing: Basic understanding of quantum principles and experience with prototyping solutions leveraging quantum platforms.
* DevSecOps: Experience integrating security practices into CI/CD pipelines.
* Agile Development: Proven ability to deliver in an Agile environment, using tools like Jira and GitLab.
* UI Development: Expertise in building intuitive user interfaces with modern JavaScript frameworks.
  

Preferred Qualifications:  

* Knowledge of big data platforms (e.g., Apache Spark, Databricks).
* Experience with Power BI and other data visualization tools.
* Strong scripting skills in Python or Shell in a Linux environment.
* Knowledge of containerization best practices and infrastructure automation.

Skills & Competencies:  

* Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
* Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills to articulate technical solutions clearly.
* Strong understanding of secure coding practices and software architecture principles.
* Adaptable to rapidly changing technologies and business requirements.
  

Why Join Us?

  

At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build never seen before solutions to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.

  

Location: Stockholm, Sweden  

Type: Full-Time  

Experience Level: Mid-Senior Level

title: Experienced Full-Stack Developer
description:
We are looking for an experienced full-stack developer who is deeply passionate about coding and designing scalable systems. You will be a central part of driving our software team, building customer relations, and helping us create better products and services that both our customers and us can be proud of. You will work closely with our design and hardware teams.


At Above, we develop world-class user experiences with sustainable hardware, smart cloud services, and beautiful mobile apps. You will have the opportunity to work with multi-disciplinary project teams on a wide variety of design and innovation projects and prototypes. We believe in creating a culture where you, as an individual, can take responsibility for your work, but we also take care of each other as we navigate ambiguity, tackle challenging problems, and grow as a team together.


One of our core philosophies is that we believe in bringing design and technology together from the very beginning, breaking down boundaries between the physical and the digital, while fusing hardware and software into meaningful product experiences.

**Skills**
----------

* Ability to translate product requirements and user needs into human, readable code that is easy to maintain and evolve
* Plan projects and estimate time and resources needed
* Experience with multiple backend and frontend frameworks
* GIT, build systems, testing tools
* Hands-on, persistent, result-oriented, and humble — you get things done
* Stimulated by leading and collaborating with a team to define, design, and ship new features
* Experience with deploying and scaling frontend and backend solutions, Google Cloud/ Azure/AWS
* Strong communication and leadership skills

**Things we think are cool for you to have, but aren't deal breakers**

* Experience with languages as Typescript, Node.js, Go, C#, Rust
* Experience with app development using React Native and/or Flutter
* Experience with native mobile development, including Bluetooth and BLE
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
* Demonstrable experience on past projects (via Github, BitBucket, etc)
* Awareness of the latest libraries and tendencies
* Working knowledge and up to date with modern web development trends
* Linux experience
* Knowledge of IOT and common network techniques such as MQTT or Protobuf
* Raspberry, Arduino and electronics experience
* AI, VR, AR, Robotics, 3D printing

**What Above has to offer**


At Above you’ll have the chance to bring products to life for some of the world's most exciting clients. We’re a team of warm, welcoming, dedicated people that love to create amazing stuff together!

  

* Diverse assignments and client portfolio, work with local and global clients
* Access to support system of experts and personal coaches
* Actively promote caring and supportive leadership
* Competitive compensation package
* Access to Eidra's network of experts, from Brand Strategy to Tech Development
* 

**A bit about Above**


Above is a Scandinavian innovation agency dedicated to driving positive change through the integration of strategy, design, and technology. We collaborate with global brands and emerging startups to craft futures that are optimistic, sustainable, and enjoyable.


We encourage applications from candidates who can contribute to the diversity of our organisation. Our commitment to an inclusive workplace extends across all aspects of our recruitment and employment practices.

 **How to apply**


To apply, please submit your resume, and your portfolio. In your portfolio, we want to see some of your best work and how you influenced the process & end result.


We're excited to hear from you!

title: Full Stack Engineer
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, IT System Testing and Evaluation, and Financial Services
description:
6 Month Contract - Hybrid - March Start Date!
 



  





 We are seeking a highly skilled Full Stack Developer with extensive experience in Java, React, GitHub ActionScript, and SQL. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining our web applications, ensuring optimal performance and user experience.

title: Software Engineer
description:
The era of pervasive AI has arrived. In this era, organizations will use generative AI to unlock hidden value in their data, accelerate processes, reduce costs, drive efficiency and innovation to fundamentally transform their businesses and operations at scale.
   

  

 SambaNova Suite™ is the first full-stack, generative AI platform, from chip to model, optimized for enterprise and government organizations. Powered by the intelligent SN40L chip, the SambaNova Suite is a fully integrated platform, delivered on-premises or in the cloud, combined with state-of-the-art open-source models that can be easily and securely fine-tuned using customer data for greater accuracy. Once adapted with customer data, customers retain model ownership in perpetuity, so they can turn generative AI into one of their most valuable assets.
   

  

 If you recently graduated (within the past 2 years) or will graduate within the upcoming academic year and are interested in full-time software engineering opportunities with the leading AI startup, please apply below and tell us a little about yourself! If there's a match someone will be in contact.
   

  

 We are looking especially for engineers with
 **two or more** 
 of the following skill sets:
   

  

* Tooling and Infrastructure
* System Software
* Machine Learning & Applications
* Computer Architecture
* Hardware / Software Co-Design


**Benefits Summary For US-Based Full-Time Direct Employment Positions**
**(The Recruiter will provide benefit details for non-US-based roles)**
 SambaNova offers a competitive total rewards package, including the base salary, plus equity and benefits. We cover 95% premium coverage for employee medical insurance, and 77% premium coverage for dependents and offer a Health Savings Account (HSA) with employer contribution. We also offer Dental, Vision, Short/Long term Disability, Basic Life, Voluntary Life, and AD&D insurance plans in addition to Flexible Spending Account (FSA) options like Health Care, Limited Purpose, and Dependent Care. Our library of well-being benefits available to you and your dependents includes a full subscription to Headspace, Gympass+ membership with access to physical gyms, One Medical membership, counseling services with an Employee Assistance Program, and much more.
   

  

**Submission Guidelines**
 Please note that in order to be considered an applicant for any position at SambaNova Systems, you must submit an application form for each position for which you believe you are qualified.
   

  

*If you are a new, recent (within the last two years), or upcoming college graduate and are interested in opportunities with SambaNova Systems, please apply through our university job listings.*
**EEO Policy**
 SambaNova Systems is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard basis of age (40 and over), color, disability, gender identity, genetic information, marital status, military or veteran status, national origin/ancestry, race, religion, creed, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, breastfeeding), sexual orientation, and any other applicable status protected by federal, state, or local laws.

title: Senior Software Engineer (.NET Core)
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Description**
 We are a forward-thinking team creating cutting-edge, cloud-based communication solutions. Our backend systems leverage the latest C# and .NET Core technologies, deployed in Kubernetes on AWS. We thrive on collaboration, innovation, and crafting scalable, reliable systems that power seamless communication worldwide.
   

  

 If you're a Senior Backend Engineer with a passion for problem-solving, clean code, and modern DevOps practices, we'd love to have you on our team.
   

  

**Role**
 As a Senior Backend Engineer, you'll take ownership of developing and maintaining high-performing backend systems while contributing to all stages of the software lifecycle. In this role, you will:
   

  

* Develop scalable and resilient distributed systems using C# and .NET Core.
* Work closely with engineers, DevOps specialists, and product managers in an agile, cross-functional team.
* Build and maintain applications running on Kubernetes, actively monitor production systems, and ensure reliability.
* Leverage AWS tools and services to deploy, optimize, and scale cloud-based systems.
* Write clean, testable, and maintainable code, with a focus on system performance and scalability.
* Enhance automation, streamline CI/CD pipelines, and troubleshoot issues proactively.
* Influence architectural decisions and actively contribute to enhancing our development and operational practices.


**Requirements**
* Major professional experience building and maintaining backend systems in production.
* Expertise in C#, .NET Core, and developing distributed systems.
* Solid understanding of DevOps principles and experience with CI/CD pipelines.
* Strong communication skills and a collaborative mindset.
* A passion for clean, testable code and modern software practices.


**Good to have**
* Service-oriented architecture and microservices.
* Relational and NoSQL databases (e.g., MySQL, MSSQL, Redis).
* Hands-on experience with Kubernetes and AWS.
* Incident response and on-call rotations.
* Proficiency in additional programming languages such as C++, Python, or Kotlin
* Experience with Asterisk and VoIP protocols, preferably SIP.


 Embrace the challenge and join us! You will have the chance to:
   

  

* Work with a talented and diverse team in a culture that values innovation and collaboration.
* Take on meaningful challenges and grow with the latest technologies.
* Enjoy flexibility with remote work options and a healthy work-life balance.
* Benefit from competitive salaries and a comprehensive benefits package, including healthcare insurance, pension contributions, and wellness allowance.


**Our Hiring Process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: . No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Frontend Engineer
description:
Do you want to challenge the status quo and be a part of the disruptive innovation that’s changing the traditional banking services?
   

  

 Do you want to work in an entrepreneurial environment yet have all the perks from being a part of an international media company?
   

  

 If yes, then take the opportunity to join the FinTech superstar Lendo. Lendo has already established a strong position in the Nordics. The newly acquired PSD2 licence creates opportunities in open banking, enabling us to further develop our value proposition and drive scalability in more markets.
   

  

**What You Tell Your Friends You Do**
 I am a developer at Lendo, where I'm enhancing proven products and establishing new ones within the loan comparison, account services and payment areas.
   

  

**What You Will Really Be Doing**
* Use a modern technology stack such as React, Javascript, Kubernetes, Docker, RabbitMQ, PostgreSQL...etc.
* Create exciting new products and features
* Build, lead, design and optimize components to make them reusable for Lendo in multiple countries
* Build software that is used daily by a great number of user
* Take ownership of our projects and products!
* Collaborate closely with colleagues and the business to increase value for our users
* Prioritize work with the team and its Product Owner.
* Write tests at different levels to ensure quality and that your code really does what you want
* Identify and keep track of metrics that tell you how your software is performing
* Be creative and brainstorm ideas for ways we can further streamline our development
* Bring your own unique skill set to the table
* You’ll become part of an international, agile, multidisciplinary team that loves to discuss and solve problems in the group.
* You’ll experiment, test, try, fail and learn all the time


**We offer**
* A place for everyone - You are welcome at Lendo for who you are, no matter where you come from or what you look like. Our product is for everyone, and so is our workplace!
* Room for you to do things your way
* We like to inspire your passion by organizing hackathons and other knowledge-sharing event
* A wellness program, if you want to do yoga, meditation, running and other activities with colleagues and coaches
* 4 000 SEK health promotion allowance
* 30 days of paid leave
* Super central location in Stockholm with a awesome rooftop- Please note that this position is based in Stockholm and offers a hybrid workplace setup. The required office days are Tuesdays and Wednesdays.
* And yes, we also have the industry standard perks such as ping pong tables, team activities, and fun parties!

title: Game developer
description:
We are now looking for the best game developer to join us! You have the chance to be a part of creating the best casino games in the online slot industry!
   

  

**Job Description**
* Design, develop and maintain Casino Games for both desktop and mobile browsers
* The technologies you primarily will work with are HTML5, WebGL, Typescript, Pixi, GSAP and Javascript.
* In a team environment that consists of product management, graphic artistry, sound creation, server development and game mechanics, you will contribute to deliver the best casino games in the market today.
* Your main responsibilities are to make the game graphics come alive with spectacular animations, game flow, game mechanics and sounds according to a result delivered by our game servers.


 Who you are
   

  

* You are a Master Google Searcher that have Stackoverflow as your absolute favourite web site.
* You have practical experience of working with OOP in some language and you have a pragmatic approach to software development.
* Taking on technical challenges and solving them is something you take pride in.
* Quality, not only of the code you write, but the delivered system is important to you.
* You thrive in an environment where you are responsible for your code and take ownership of changes from editor to production system.


 Beneficial skills
   

  

* Working experience of mobile browsers and knowledge about their limitations and how they work in different ways is a big plus.


 Who we are
   

  

 We are the best and fastest growing slot provider in the world with the operator and product in focus, and the mobile future on our minds. Nolimit is a team of experienced professionals from the gambling industry in Stockholm, Sweden, Malta and Gurugram, India. Our company has derived from hands on work at some of the most successful gambling software providers and operators over the last 15 years. Our mission is to offer a fast, reliable and flexible team that cooperates with the best operators in the world, taking gambling to the next level.
   

  

 We have a clean code high performance modern mini/micro service portable system platform for mobile and desktop that is 100 % under our own control. Since we have our own platform, this allows us to deliver special features and smooth, customizable marketing campaigns that are tailored to the operator's specific needs. We think it's time for a new angle to the gambling software industry – one where the product is in focus and we fully engage their promotion, marketing and country manager system/activities with our games. Nolimit work with customers on a global scale and the largest gambling operators in the world have our games everywhere.
   

  

 Nolimit City, Stockholm based development team. We provide you with your choice of OS and IDE.
   

  

 Send your application to hr-sweden@nolimitcity.com
   

  

 http://www.nolimitcity.com

 English (fluent)
   

  

**Meriting**

 07-02-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!

title: Java utvecklare
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Job Description**
 We are looking for a Java developer for our team. The team has been established to work with our new Java platform that will be in production in late 2025. It is our core platform for supporting our B2B business products Leasing and Billing. We are on a transformation journey to migrate our current COBOL based platform to Java, in this work we also need to transform surrounding integrations and file flows so that these can communicate with the new Java based platform. We are now expanding the team in order to be able to take on tasks and develop/re-write integrations, develop functions according to our new design philosophy that will replace functions that are not part of the one-to-one migration of the platform. You will be working with our DevLead for the Java based system and colleagues in our Lifecycle team that have the domain knowledge within our solutions.
   

  

**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* 5 years' experience of backend development in Java
* Experience in Apigee, PostgreSQL/Oracle RDBMS, React, Vue.js, JavaScript, Typescript, Linux, CSS and Bash
* Experience in GitHub, GitHub Runners, JFrog Artifactory, Maven, Gradle
* Experience with database integration, active directory integration and some frontend knowledge
* Experience of working according to DevOps in an agile development environment
* Hands-on coding and code reviews to maintain the highest code quality standards
* Fluent Swedish and English in speech and writing
* We see experience of working with test-driven development as a plus


**Meritorious**
* We also view experience of working with advanced invoicing solutions and/or account receivable solutions or accounting experience in a business system context as a plus

 28-01-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*
