title: Axis Camera Application Platform SDK - Integration Specialist
description:
Job Title
Axis Camera Application Platform SDK - Integration Specialist
Job Description
Who is your future team?
In the Ecosystem team, our mission is to *Enable and support innovation around Axis devices*. Our ACAP framework makes it possible to develop and run custom applications on edge in our cameras and other devices. We are the link between functionality available in AXIS OS and developers all over the world who want to innovate based on that functionality – all the way from idea to production.
What you'll do here as an ACAP SDK Integration Specialist?
Your main responsibility is to make sure that developers who use our SDK are successful. To do this you will collaborate with many functions within Axis: product management, software development teams, release program, technology integration partner engineers, and sales engineers. You will work proactively to ensure the right information is available for developers to succeed with using the SDK, and help them when they get stuck.
You will facilitate releases of the ACAP SDK which involves communication with multiple function teams who provide APIs into AXIS OS. You will ensure quality of the release, and coordinate public communication regarding the release.
You will be responsible for clear and efficient channels for technical support to developers, both within and outside of Axis. You will be in direct contact with many developers yourself, and when you cannot help them you will navigate the organization to engage the right technical experts.
The ACAP integration offer touches on many aspects of software development, for example cloud integrations, cybersecurity, and machine learning. Depending on your skill set, experience, and interest the role provides opportunity to grow your expertise in one or more of these areas.
Who are we looking for?
You are service minded and like helping people. You know how to network and gain trust, both with colleagues within Axis and with external partners. You have a business mindset and get excited by technology getting used in new and creative ways. You are structured and naturally create order around you. You know that clear expectations make it easier for everyone to work, and you consistently refine your way of communicating to reduce friction for everybody.
We'd love to hear that you have:* Professional experience as a software developer
* Excellent written and spoken communication skills in English
* Proven experience and interest in helping others succeed, through e.g. background in teaching, customer support, technical documentation
* A drive to do things one step better all the time
* A big interest in learning about our technology and work hands-on with it


It's a bonus if you also have prior experience with:* Embedded software development in C
* Broad software knowledge and/or expertise in some area such as cloud development, cybersecurity, or machine learning
* Leadership, for example project management, product management, tech lead, or similar
* Axis products and partner ecosystem


What Axis have to offer  

At Axis we offer the opportunity to work with experienced colleagues in a global environment with many possibilities. To us your future career and development is important.
Our corporate culture is essential – where equal opportunities, team spirit and to have fun are key! We want you to enjoy working with us and therefore we offer benefits such as flexible working hours, morning fika, Friday cake, bonus program, fitness allowance, health insurance and your very own Axis bike, to name a few.  

Ready to Act?
Don't wait, we go through the selection continuously!
Looking forward to your application,
Maria Henningsson, recruiting manager.
Type of Employment
Permanent Employment
Posting End Date
2025-02-21*Certain roles at Axis require background checks, which means applicable verifications will be done in these recruitments.* *Notice will be provided before we take any action.*
About Axis Communications
We enable a smarter, safer world by creating innovative solutions for improving security and business performance. As a network technology company and industry leader, we offer solutions in video surveillance, access control, intercom, and audio systems, enhanced by intelligent analytics applications.
With around 4500 committed employees in over 50 countries, we collaborate with partners worldwide. Together, we thrive in our friendly, open, and collaborative culture and inspire each other to think beyond the expected. United by our commitment to inclusion, diversity, and sustainability, we consistently seek to develop our skills and way of working.
Let´s create a smarter, safer world
For more information about Axis, please visit our website www.axis.com.
Listen to Get To Know Axis – Podcast

title: Engineer with experience in synthetic data for Deep Learning
description:
Job Title
Engineer with experience in synthetic data for Deep Learning
Job Description
Do you want to work with cutting edge technologies within video analytics together with highly skilled colleagues, at a world leading company? Take a look at this opportunity!  

Who is your future team?
You will join our Core Technologies Analytics team, that is responsible for the foundation of Axis long term technology within video analytics. We deliver new core technology functionality to Axis future analytics applications and solutions.
The position is hands-on in a highly skilled team that values individual growth, teamwork and great spirit. The team has a unique profile of technically strong and ambitious yet humble and supportive developers with a desire to achieve great results while maintaining an inspiring work atmosphere.
What will you do?
You will play a vital role in the Core Technologies Analytics team, focusing on Deep Learning at the research frontline and developing production-ready, high-quality algorithms for embedded, server and cloud systems. Your responsibilities will include enabling new product features and mastering complex problems within the Deep Learning domain. You will be an important part of the creation of analytics features and participating in the exciting development path leading to the launch of new competitive products and solutions.
One of the most important areas in Deep Learning development is producing training material for the algorithms. Here synthetic data plays an important role, and the area becomes rapidly more and more developed. You will be part of the team driving this area.  

Who are we looking for?  

Now we are looking for an experienced engineer with a genuine interest to work with video analytics algorithms, synthetic data generation for Deep Learning and AI, and realism in computer graphic.
We believe that you are a pragmatic and structured person with an open and curious mindset. You are communicative and enjoy teamwork. You probably have an engineering degree and work experience in the game graphics and graphic design area.
As Axis values teamwork it is important that you contribute with good spirit and welcome the different agile working methodologies used in our projects.
The following would also be great merits:* Experience in tools like Unreal Engine, Houdini and Blender.
* Experience in working with synthetic data for Deep Learning development.
* Experience with procedural generation, and the artistic graphical knowledge to make natural and realistic materials, textures, and lighting.
* Experience of leadership roles.


What Axis has to offer
Openness is the core of who we truly are. Our most important asset is our ability to cooperate. We have realized that great ideas can come from anywhere. Therefore, we encourage everybody to contribute and innovate towards our vision. If you are a person that likes to get involved and make a difference, you will find a home with us.
Axis offers great benefits, e.g. flexible working hours, classic Swedish “fika” Friday afternoon, morning fika every day, corporate bonus, physical training grants, insurances and your very own Axis bicycle. As a global company we offer relocation assistance if needed.
We also provide a brand-new training facility free for every Axis employee. You can see it here Axis HQ. We believe in sustainability, equality and inclusion. Read more here.
Axis is an organization that values creativity and promotes teamwork and openness. With us you will grow both personally and professionally. You will be part of a team of great colleagues that enjoy going to work in the morning. Welcome!  

Ready to Act?  

Do you want to join us? Apply today! Contact our recruiting manager Magnus Svensson at phone +46 706 84 57 70 if you want more information.
Type of Employment
Permanent Employment
Posting End Date
2025-02-21*Certain roles at Axis require background checks, which means applicable verifications will be done in these recruitments.* *Notice will be provided before we take any action.*
About Axis Communications
We enable a smarter, safer world by creating innovative solutions for improving security and business performance. As a network technology company and industry leader, we offer solutions in video surveillance, access control, intercom, and audio systems, enhanced by intelligent analytics applications.
With around 4500 committed employees in over 50 countries, we collaborate with partners worldwide. Together, we thrive in our friendly, open, and collaborative culture and inspire each other to think beyond the expected. United by our commitment to inclusion, diversity, and sustainability, we consistently seek to develop our skills and way of working.
Let´s create a smarter, safer world
For more information about Axis, please visit our website www.axis.com.
Listen to Get To Know Axis – Podcast

title: Doktorand i cyberfysiska system
description:
*Luleå tekniska universitet är i stark tillväxt med världsledande kompetens inom flera forskningsområden. Vi formar framtiden genom nydanande utbildningar och banbrytande forskningsresultat, och med utgångspunkt i den arktiska regionen skapar vi global samhällsnytta. Vår vetenskapliga som konstnärliga forskning och utbildning bedrivs i nära samarbete med internationella, nationella och regionala företag, offentliga aktörer och ledande universitet. Luleå tekniska universitet omsätter totalt 2 miljarder kronor per år. Vi är idag 1 500 anställda och har 17 900 studenter.*  

  

*De kommande åren investeras mångmiljardbelopp i Norrbotten och Västerbotten i stora projekt som syftar till ett mer hållbart samhälle nationellt så väl som globalt. Luleå tekniska universitet är involverat i flera av dessa högaktuella forskningsprojekt och den samhällsomvandling som följer. Vi har ett brett utbud av utbildningar för att matcha den kompetens som efterfrågas. Vi hoppas att du vill hjälpa oss att bygga framtidens hållbara företag och samhällen.*


Avdelningen EISLAB vid Institutionen för datavetenskap, elektroteknik och rymdteknik bedriver forskning inom cyber-fysiska system, sakernas internet, automatisering av system av system, maskininlärning, djupinlärning, data science, elektroniksystemdesign och sensorsystem.  

Cyber-fysiska system (CPS) fokuserar på integrerade programvaru- och applikationsarkitekturer med implementationer av massivt distribuerade inbyggda system som samverkar med varandra och sina omgivningar för att möjliggöra säkra, målmedvetna, autonoma och utvecklingsbara lösningar. Det inkluderar mjukvarudefinierade system av system för automatisering och digitalisering inom produktionsindustrier. Vår forskning bedrivs i nära samarbete med företag som Bosch, Ericsson, Volvo, Infineon, Boliden, LKAB, SKF och ledande internationella universitet. Ett stort resultat är Eclipse Arrowhead, ett öppet källkodsramverk för industriell automation som stöds av europeisk industri.  

  

**Ämnesbeskrivning**  

Cyberfysiska system omfattar integrerad mjukvara, elektronikhårdvara och applikationsarkitektur inom uppkopplade enheter och distribuerade system. Forskningen syftar till att skapa säkra, autonoma och utvecklingsbara lösningar som interagerar med varandra och sin omgivning, från kant till moln.  

  

**Projektbeskrivning**  

Du kommer initialt att arbeta som en del av ett team av forskare inom det europeiska projektet. Du kommer att arbeta inom några av följande områden:
  

* Cybersäkerhet och arkitekturdesign.
* Industriell SoS-säkerhet, inklusive säkerhetsriskanalys.
* Testning för säkerhet samt analys och implementering av säkerhetsåtgärder.

-Åtkomst- och användningskontroll för säker datadelning i industriella ekosystem.
  

* Virtualization i cloud-to-edge-continuumet för flexibla och anpassningsbara distribuerade system.

  

Projektet syftar till att ytterligare digitalisera den europeiska industrin där EISLAB kommer att ansvara för CPS-intelligens, IoT och SoS-automatiseringsarkitektur samt användningen av AI och maskininlärning (ML). Målet är att producera vetenskapliga artiklar och bidrag med öppen källkod för Eclipse Arrowhead.  

Projekten innebär vanligtvis samarbete med både akademiska och industriella partners i Europa. Därför är samarbete med programvaru- och automationsindustrin - både som framtida produktägare och användare - en nyckelfaktor för framgången för dessa projekt. I detta kommer du att arbeta nära andra forskare och doktorander vid Luleå tekniska universitet.  

  

**Arbetsuppgifter**  

Som doktorand arbetar du mot en doktorsexamen som det slutliga målet. Arbetet kommer att ta upp målen enligt högskoleförordningen. Största delen av din tid kommer att ägnas åt att arbeta med forskningsprojekt där du kommer att utveckla proof-of-concept för att experimentellt utvärdera och utforska aspekter av industriella mjukvarusystem och komponenter. Du kommer att presentera dina resultat på internationella konferenser och i vetenskapliga tidskrifter.  

För att stödja ditt avhandlingsarbete kommer du att ta kurser som en del av doktorandstudierna, generiska kurser för LTU:s doktorandprogram, särskilt utformade kurser osv. Din forskning och dina kurser kommer att planeras och dokumenteras i din individuella studieplan under hela din studietid. Dessutom bedrivs undervisning och annan institutionstjänstgöring vid avdelningen eller institutionen av doktorander.  

  

**Kvalifikationer**  

Vi söker dig - en talangfull, analytisk och motiverad kollega som både ensam och i samarbete med andra kan utföra avancerad forskning i vår forskningsgrupp. Den nödvändiga bakgrunden för sökande är en masterexamen i datavetenskap eller motsvarande. Även examen i elektroteknik, teknisk fysik eller liknande kommer att beaktas.  

Sökanden måste vara kunnig inom datavetenskap. Tidigare erfarenhet av att arbeta med SOA, IoT, SysML, ML, CPS och/eller SoS är värdefullt men inte ett krav. Sökanden måste också ha goda programmeringskunskaper, inklusive mjukvarudesign, grundläggande programmeringskoncept samt erfarenhet av Java-programmering eller liknande. Flytande kunskaper i muntlig och skriftlig kommunikation på engelska är ett krav.  

  

För ytterligare information om specifik doktorandutbildning se  

studieplaner för forskarutbildning inom teknisk fakultet  

  

**Information**  

Anställning som doktorand är begränsad till 4 år, med möjlighet till förlängning om högst ett år för undervisning och annan institutionstjänstgöring. Plats: Luleå. Start: Hösten 2025.  

  

För ytterligare information om tjänsten, kontakta Dr. Shailesh Singh Chouhan, 0920-49 2165 shailesh.chouhan@ltu.se  

  

Fackliga företrädare:  

SACO-S Diana Chroneer 0920-49 2037 diana.chroneer@ltu.se  

OFR-S Lars Frisk, 0920-49 1792 lars.frisk@ltu.se  

  

**Ansökan**  

Vi föredrar att du ansöker om denna position genom att klicka på ansökningsknappen nedan. Ansökan bör inkludera CV, personligt brev och kopior av verifierade examensbevis från gymnasiet och universitetet. Märk din ansökan med referensnumret ovan. Din ansökan, inklusive examensbevis, måste vara skriven på engelska eller svenska.  

  

**Sista ansökningsdag:** 24 februari 2025  

**Referensnummer:** 386-2025

title: Sr Support Analyst
description:
As the recognized global standard for project-based businesses, Deltek delivers software and information solutions to help organizations achieve their purpose. Our market leadership stems from the work of our diverse employees who are united by a passion for learning, growing and making a difference. At Deltek, we take immense pride in creating a balanced, values-driven environment, where every employee feels included and empowered to do their best work. Our employees put our core values into action daily, creating a one-of-a-kind culture that has been recognized globally. Thanks to our incredible team, Deltek has been named one of America's Best Midsize Employers by Forbes, a Best Place to Work by Glassdoor, a Top Workplace by The Washington Post and a Best Place to Work in Asia by World HRD Congress. www.deltek.com  

**Business Summary**


Deltek’s award winning Support Services team provides best-in-class assistance to Deltek’s customers across the world via phone, chat and email. Our team is comprised of a group of diverse, collaborative and passionate professionals who come from varying industries, backgrounds and professions. Our diversity and passion is our strength, so however you identify and whatever background you bring, we invite you to explore our team as a potential next step in your career!
**Position Responsibilities**


* Provide world-class support to Deltek’s Maconomy Enterprise and Cloud based customers.
* Leveraging a problem-solving mindset to effectively understand, troubleshoot and triage.
* Meeting operational and customer satisfaction-related metrics both individually and as part of a team.
* Driving continuous improvements and expand skills and knowledge.
* Effectively managing customer expectations, and customer experience as well as contributing to our Knowledge Base.
* Collaborating with your Line Manager, as well as proactively managing job tasks.
* Contributing to project-level initiatives across our team to bring value to our people, our customers, and our business.

**Qualifications**


* Progressive experience in a customer-facing, problem-solving role with a technology business
* Previous Knowledge of Maconomy ERP system, accounting background, Software and/or Database knowledge (SQL or Oracle) and/or Superuser experience from another ERP system is an advantage.
* A clear passion for delivering great customer service and demonstrating customer-centric behaviors.
* Successful career thus far working in a team environment and strong problem-solving skills
* Ownership with the ability to handle & prioritize multiple tasks at the same time
* General Microsoft server operating system knowledge and proficiency with MS Office applications
* Ability to multi-task in a fast-paced environment, operating independently and being self-motivated

**Travel Requirements**


No
**Applicant Privacy Notice**


*Deltek is committed to the protection and promotion of your privacy. In connection with your application for employment with us at Deltek, it is necessary for us to collect, store and use information about you (“Personal Data”) to administer and evaluate your application. We are the “controller” of the Personal Data you provide us and will process any such Personal Data in accordance with applicable law and the statements contained in this* Employment Candidate Privacy Notice*. Additionally, we have not sold and do not sell Personal Data you provide to us through the job application process.*

title: RVP and Head of R&CG and B2C - Sweden
description:
*To get the best candidate experience, please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating efforts.*

Job Category


Sales
Job Details


**About Salesforce**

We’re Salesforce, the Customer Company, inspiring the future of business with AI+ Data +CRM. Leading with our core values, we help companies across every industry blaze new trails and connect with customers in a whole new way. And, we empower you to be a Trailblazer, too — driving your performance and career growth, charting new paths, and improving the state of the world. If you believe in business as the greatest platform for change and in companies doing well and doing good – you’ve come to the right place.


***Deadline for applications Friday 7 February 2025***

An opportunity exists in our Swedish Enterprise Sales organisation for a experienced sales leader looking to further their career in a hyper-growth, fast-paced and dynamic environment! We are seeking an exceptional and ambitious Sales Manager who will play a key role in driving strategic, Salesforce sales initiatives with Retail, Consumer Goods, Telecom, Media and Automotive industries.
  

  

**Role Description:**  

As a Sales Leader, you will play a key role leading a team of highly visible and motivated Sales Executives in our expanding Sweden sales operation that generates revenue and achieves individual, team and organisational quotas.
  

  

Your network within Retail, Consumer Goods, Telecom, Media and Automotive is broad and strong, your mind revolves around customers’ business outcomes and you’re business acumen including numerics (selling to the CFO, or similar skills) is evident. Energy, passion and the ability to lead are key. Ideal candidates should possess solid B2B sales and extensive Sales management experience. Extensive (+10yrs) of Industry experience in primarily Retail & Consumer Goods is a must. Experience from other industries such as manufacturing and/or financial services is desirable and will be an additional differentiator.
  

  

**Your Impact:**  

Development of a growing and diverse team who are seen as trusted advisors to our customer(s) and with internal team members
  

Supporting Account Executives by participating and leading in client meetings and engaging other corporate resources as required
  

Management of a high performance team, including recruiting, hiring and training
  

Build strong team unity, internal connections, and collaboration across the Salesforce eco-system
  

Leading weekly forecast meetings
  

Driving pipeline generation initiatives to improve revenue generating opportunities for the customer account(s)
  

Mentor and professionally develop Account Executives regarding strategies to ensure a high level of closure rates and opportunity identification
  

Engaging at the C-level in customer organisations and partners. Substantial time in customer and partner facing settings is expected.
  

Develop and execute Go-To-Market (GTM) plan for key industries such as Retail and Consumer Goods
  

Utilising your strong industry network will be instrumental for building our brand and presences in our Key Industries such as Retail & Consumer Goods
  

Accurate reporting on sales activity and forecasting to Area Sales Management
  

Consistently supervising and enhancing the sales activities of the team
  

To be an enabler of an inclusive and winning team spirit
  

  

**Required skills:**  

Consistent track record in building / managing high performance teams
  

Able to operate and navigate successfully in a matrix / multi-product sales environment
  

Experience selling transformational technology solutions to major Enterprise customers
  

Previous experience in solution sales (especially Software / SaaS / Cloud)
  

A level of interest in, and/or experience positioning/selling to the Retail, Consumer goods, Telco or/and Automotive Industry
  

Strong demonstrated and proven sales experience, working with complex customers
  

1st Line Management experience
  

A passion for building a growing and diverse team
  

Proven ability to create and inspire high performing teams
  

Excellent interpersonal skills; able to inspire and build trusted relationships (internally and externally)
  

Passion for supporting team development, as well as for their own self-improvement
  

Excellent negotiation skills
  

A self-starter that can excel in a fast-paced environment
  

Sweden and English fluency  

  



Accommodations


If you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Form .


Posting Statement


At Salesforce we believe that the business of business is to improve the state of our world. Each of us has a responsibility to drive Equality in our communities and workplaces. We are committed to creating a workforce that reflects society through inclusive programs and initiatives such as equal pay, employee resource groups, inclusive benefits, and more. Learn more about Equality at www.equality.com and explore our company benefits at www.salesforcebenefits.com .


Salesforce is an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, or disability status. Salesforce does not accept unsolicited headhunter and agency resumes. Salesforce will not pay any third-party agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with Salesforce .
﻿

Salesforce welcomes all.
company_description: Salesforce is the customer company. We make cloud-based software designed to help businesses connect to their customers in a whole new way.

To be an enabler of an inclusive and winning team spirit
  

  

**Required skills:**  

Consistent track record in building / managing high performance teams
  

Able to operate and navigate successfully in a matrix / multi-product sales environment
  

Experience selling transformational technology solutions to major Enterprise customers
  

Previous experience in solution sales (especially Software / SaaS / Cloud)
  

A level of interest in, and/or experience positioning/selling to the Retail, Consumer goods, Telco or/and Automotive Industry
  

Strong demonstrated and proven sales experience, working with complex customers
  

1st Line Management experience
  

A passion for building a growing and diverse team
  

Proven ability to create and inspire high performing teams
  

Excellent interpersonal skills; able to inspire and build trusted relationships (internally and externally)
  

Passion for supporting team development, as well as for their own self-improvement
  

Excellent negotiation skills
  

A self-starter that can excel in a fast-paced environment
  

Sweden and English fluency


Accommodations


If you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Form .


Posting Statement


At Salesforce we believe that the business of business is to improve the state of our world. Each of us has a responsibility to drive Equality in our communities and workplaces. We are committed to creating a workforce that reflects society through inclusive programs and initiatives such as equal pay, employee resource groups, inclusive benefits, and more. Learn more about Equality at www.equality.com and explore our company benefits at www.salesforcebenefits.com .


Salesforce is an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, or disability status. Salesforce does not accept unsolicited headhunter and agency resumes. Salesforce will not pay any third-party agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with Salesforce .
﻿

Salesforce welcomes all.
company_description: Salesforce is the customer company. We make cloud-based software designed to help businesses connect to their customers in a whole new way.

title: Marketing Coordinator EMEA
description:
Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch’s Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
  
Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
  
At Sinch we “Dream Big”, “Win Together”, “Keep it simple”, and “Make it Happen”. These values are our foundation!
  
  

Description
  
We are seeking a dynamic and strategic Marketing Coordinator to join our EMEA Marketing team, specializing in supporting our content and communication programs.
  
As our new Marketing Coordinator EMEA you will report to the VP Marketing in EMEA and you will play a pivotal role in establishing and nurturing relationships with key customers, driving brand visibility, and positioning Sinch as a thought leader in the Digital Customer Communication space.
  
The role is based at our HQ in Stockholm.
  
  

**Responsibilities:**  

Campaign Activation
  
* Develop and execute a comprehensive activation for engaging with Sinch customers and prospects, ensuring alignment with overall marketing and business objectives.


Content Coordination
  
* Develop and manage a content calendar aligned with the Field marketing plans and campaigns.
* Collaborate with the marketing team to produce engaging and informative content, ensuring consistency in messaging and brand representation


Event Management
  
* Support our Event teams with content and communication and design assets.


Collaboration with Field Marketing, Sales and Product Teams
  
* Work closely with the Field marketers, sales and product teams to understand customer needs and incorporate market intelligence into product marketing strategies.
* Provide support for product launches and promotional activities related to association partnerships.


Requirements
  
* Previous experience of supporting marketers/marketing teams and campaign management desirable.
* Strong interest in Marketing.
* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or Communications
* Strong project management skills and attention to detail
* Excellent communication and presentation skills
* Ability to thrive in a dynamic and fast-paced environment
* Fluency in English
* Great if you have worked in Canva and Figma, Instapage, Salesforce, 6senes, MS office, ppt primarily or other similar tooling


Our hiring process
  
We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
  
We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/. No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!
company_description: We help companies to communicate with customers via messaging, voice and video using multiple channels. Simplifying life by bringing all people and businesses together using technology is our purpose.

title: Senior Fullstack Engineer with Frontend focus
description:
Our Company
  
Keystone is one of the leading organizations to help students find the right education to pursue their dreams. While for education providers, Keystone offers end-to-end solutions across the entire student recruitment value chain.
  
Backed by leading Nordic venture firms Viking Venture and Verdane, Keystone has an international staff of around 800+ employees spread across 15 countries around the globe, including the UK, Norway, Spain, Sweden and Germany.
  
  

**About the job:**  

As a Senior Full-stack Developer in our growing team, you will become part of an environment where collaboration, team spirit and personal responsibility are highly valued. The position offers challenging tasks and good development opportunities. You will be joining one of our development squads and drive the evolution and improvementof our products. You will support your colleagues and help them to develop by means of code reviews, knowledge sharing sessions and individual coaching.You will evaluate alternative technologies to support growth and increase efficiency.You will write great code that continuously raises the bar of what good looks like.
  
What technologies do we work with?
  
React / Next.js
  
Latest versions of .NET, C# and ASP.NET MVC
  
Data storage technologies like AWS Aurora, DynamoDB, etc.
  
Sanity.io
  
Elasticsearch and Redis
  
Amazon Web Services (AWS)
  
  

Who are we looking for?
  
At least 6 years experience as a full-stack developer.
  
Strong experience withReact /Next.js.
  
Good knowledgeof .NET Framework and .NET Core.
  
Good knowledge about Rest API, GraphQL, Entity Framework, and different test frameworks.
  
Enjoys working in dynamic and autonomous teams.
  
Willingness to share knowledge with the team and bravely dive into new technical as well as functional territories.
  
A great passion for building and delivering top notch products to our customers.
  
Meriting but not required, knowledge of Cloud computing on AWS and its serverless offerings.
  
  

What can we offer you?
  
Ability to work with cutting-edge technologies in exciting projects.
  
Opportunity to work with a large-scale cloud-hosted solution.
  
Freedom to help, plan and lead system architecture decisions in a fast-growing company.
  
An international work environment with colleagues from all over the world.
  
Plenty of opportunities to grow within the organization.
  
Possibility to learn and educate through seminars, knowledge sharing sessions, relevant Tech conferences and our exciting Hackathon events.
  
Monday breakfast, regular team lunches, Friday beer, team activities and fun events.
  
Hybrid work setup.
  
  

About the team
  
The engineering team is based in Stockholm and Sheffield. The responsibilities of the team encompass developing technical platforms and solutions to lay the ground for the rest of the business at Keystone Education Group. We are a rapidly growing company that is now looking for new talents to strengthen our team. Read more about us here: https://www.keg.com/
  
Do you want to join our family? Please send us your application by hitting the button "Apply here!". We are looking for someone who can start as soon as possible in our Stockholm office.
  
Keystone is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are deeply committed to fostering an inclusive environment for all employees.

title: Marketing specialist
description:
Overview
  
Modelon is a global SaaS company that specializes in providing an innovative cloud-based platform, Modelon Impact, for the design and simulation of engineering technology. Headquartered in Lund, Sweden, we leverage model-based engineering and industry expertise that help engineers design innovative and climate-friendly products while saving costs. As a Marketing Specialist, you will play a crucial role in executing our marketing strategies and initiatives to effectively position our brand, generate leads, and support overall business objectives.
  
  

Job Summary
  
We are seeking a highly motivated and talented Marketing Specialist to join our marketing team. The ideal candidate will have a curiosity and passion for transforming engineering concepts into compelling messages that resonate with our target audience. The ideal candidate will also be a highly organized self-starter and enjoy learning from and connecting with colleagues and customers located around the world. You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to develop and execute marketing content and social media campaigns, conduct market research, and present Modelon at various tradeshows.
  
  

Experience Level
  
Associate to Mid-level position
  
  

Responsibilities
  
Work closely with the Marketing Director to achieve marketing department goals and objectives
  
Develop and execute strategic social media campaigns to connect with our target audience and promote Modelon’s solutions.
  
Support commercial team activities including presence at trade shows, conferences, and user meetings
  
Collaborate with the marketing department and cross-functional teams to generate lead-generating content for various channels including Modelon’s website, digital campaigns, and email campaigns.
  
Collaborate with the commercial team to develop sales enablement materials, such as product brochures, presentations, and case studies, to support the sales process.
  
Implement SEO strategies and tools to generate high-quality leads
  
Support in the development of creative and innovative marketing campaigns
  
Collaborate with external vendors, agencies, and partners to execute marketing initiatives
  
Ensure creative marketing materials undergo regular review and adhere to brand guidelines
  
Stay up to date with industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in B2B marketing to identify opportunities for innovation and optimization.
  
  

Qualifications
  
Bachelor’s degree in marketing, business, or a related field
  
Must be eligible to work in the US
  
2-3 years of proven experience as a Marketing Specialist or similar role, preferably in the B2B technology sector.
  
Solid understanding of B2B marketing strategies and tactics, with a track record of successful campaign execution and lead generation
  
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
  
Ability to transform complex engineering concepts into compelling marketing stories
  
Self-motivated with excellent organization and project management skills
  
Previous experience with digital marketing platforms and tools such as Google Analytics, CRM systems, SEO tools, and social media management platforms.
  
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills to propose data-driven solutions
  
Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced and global environment
  
Familiarity with engineering technologies, such as CAE/CAD software or industrial automation is a plus
  
Fluent in English. Fluency in a second language is a plus.
  
Expect occasional international travel
  
  

Hybrid Policy
  
Modelon operates with employees coming into the office on a core day and an additional day per week. This candidate would, therefore, need to be able to commute to our Ann Arbor office twice a week at a minimum.
  
Join our team and be a part of an innovative company that is shaping the future of engineering technology. We offer comprehensive benefits and opportunities for professional growth and development.

title: Product Marketing Lead
description:
**Xensam:** SAM DisruptersXensam is the leading provider of AI-powered, cloud-hosted Software Asset Management technology. We’re looking for key players to join us as we scale our impact and build the Xensam team together. We take our culture seriously and strive to maintain the excellence, energy & enthusiasm that flows through the organization today.
  
We look for candidates who are passionate about what they do and ready to work the Xensam way. We know that experience counts, but we also know that it’s you, the person behind the experience, that makes it count.
  
About the roleAre you a master storyteller who can transform complex technology into compelling customer value? As the guardian of our product positioning, you'll shape how we communicate the value of our fast-growing Software Asset Management platform to the world.
  
As our Product Marketing Lead at Xensam, you'll be the storyteller who bridges our R&D innovations with customer needs. Working within our dynamic marketing team and reporting to the CMO, you'll own our product narrative across all channels.
  
Responsibilities
  
Guard our product positioning to ensure consistent product messaging in collaboration with R&D and marketing teams.
  
Craft compelling content that transforms technical features into business value.
  
Drive product launch campaigns and regular release communications across multiple channels.
  
Design lifecycle marketing messages within product notifications and communications.
  
Conduct market research and customer interviews to shape our narrative.
  
Transform technical documentation into customer-friendly communications.
  
Co-create brand awareness campaigns for product positioning.
  
  

Qualifications
  
2-3 years of product marketing experience, ideally in B2B SaaS.
  
Bachelor in marketing, business or tech, with additional education (course, certification, or diploma) in writing.
  
Exceptional writing skills in English with the ability to simplify complex technical concepts.
  
Strong analytical capabilities for market and customer insights.
  
Proactive approach and structured working style.
  
Excellence in cross-functional collaboration and stakeholder management.
  
  

Bonus points if you have
  
Technical writing background.
  
Confidence in front of the camera for video content.
  
Presentation and webinar experience.
  
Previous experience in Software or SaaS Asset Management.
  
  

What you get
  
A dynamic position embracing "freedom under responsibility".
  
Three days in-office (with remote work on Mondays and Fridays).
  
Free access to beverages, snacks, gym facilities, on-site massage, shuffleboard, and other games.
  
If sales targets are met, all employees enjoy an annual destination trip.
  
Join an ambitious and diverse team, and work with cutting-edge technology in the fastest-growing SAM software on the market.
  
An opportunity to shape your career growth while contributing to the company’s success.
  
  

**At Xensam, our core values define our culture:**  

**Rebellious:** We encourage a spirit of freedom and initiative within responsibility.
  
**Humane:** We foster a caring, inclusive environment that values diversity and respects individuality.
  
**Harmonious:** We promote work-life balance, creating a pleasant, supportive workplace.
  
  

Ready to own our product story? Apply now with your resume and a writing sample that showcases your ability to transform technical concepts into compelling narratives.
  
As part of our recruitment process, we conduct background checks on final candidates to fulfill our commitments to customers and ensure a safe work environment.

title: Fullstack Engineer
description:
Are you an experienced Fullstack Engineer looking to make an impact in the gaming industry? Join our Commercial Tech team and help build cutting-edge internal tools that empower our games and improve studio efficiency. In this role, you'll create innovative solutions to automate and streamline workflows, working with modern technologies in a dynamic and collaborative environment. If you're passionate about building high-performing systems and enjoy solving complex challenges, we want to hear from you!

 **Must Have:**

Strong expertise in React/Next.js (primary area of focus)


Proficiency in TypeScript

Strong problem-solving and collaboration skills

title: Product Designer
description:
Sleep is something we all share. It's so fundamental that when we don’t get enough good quality sleep, we struggle to function in all other aspects of life. That's why we at Sleep Cycle have made sleep improvement our mission, and that's how you can help improve global health by joining our effort!

 **About the Job**


Are you someone who’s known for your creative ideas, design skills and strategic thinking? Do you feel excited about further developing Sleep Cycle's product offering to delight our customers and elevate our brand? We are on the hunt for someone who wants to take our Product Design to the next level. Could this someone be you?

**Your Mission**


As one of our Product Designers, you’ll work on a product that helps millions of people sleep better, making a real impact on their health and wellbeing. You will be part of one of our cross-functional teams driving clear, outcome-based goals, having a direct effect on Sleep Cycle’s success, while helping millions of users achieve their health goals through better sleep.

 **Your Key Responsibilities**

* Be the voice of the customer and create delightful solutions that have a high impact on business outcomes.
* Represent design throughout discovery and delivery, collaborating closely with the Tech Lead and Product Manager.
* Champion modern design thinking and methodologies within your team, ensuring user-centered design principles guide decision-making.
* Bridge the gap between our users and the product team.

**What We’re Looking For**

* Proven experience working at least 5 years as a Product Designer in a cross-functional product team, preferably working on B2C subscription products.
* Fluent in Figma and Adobe Creative Cloud.
* Strong skills in interaction and visual design, with a track record of creating appealing user interfaces.
* Ability to create prototypes from hypotheses and validate them quickly with real users
* Someone who thrives as a designer in a data-driven team where experimentation is key to success.
* Understanding of when to take smart shortcuts to quickly test hypotheses.
* A true team player, someone who collaborates effectively and lifts those around them.
* A higher education in a relevant field.

  

**Nice to Have:**

* Art direction skills to create beautiful visuals and evolve our visual brand identity
* Experience with animations/micro animation
* A genuine interest in health and sleep.
* Fluency in Swedish.
  

**What’s in it for you?**  

Sleep Cycle is all about creating a supportive and stimulating work environment, surrounded by awesome colleagues who genuinely like spending time together. Around here, kicking back and sharing a laugh is just as crucial as getting the job done.


But don't worry, you'll still face plenty of challenges and tackle some tough problems head-on. And we do it together, because we believe our creativity and innovation power peaks when we gather and collaborate in our stunning office, located on the 20th floor of the Kineum skyscraper in Gothenburg.

title: SAP-konsult, Stockholm
description:
**Position Description:**
-------------------------


Knner du dig nyfiken p nya utmaningar? Vill du jobba p en flexibel arbetsplats med spnnande uppdrag inom SAP?  

  

Nu sker vi erfarna SAP-konsulter till vrt team i Stockholm, som r en del av vr nationella SAP Practice dr vi jobbar tillsammans med SAP i fokus. Nu sker en renssans inom SAP med SAP S/4HANA, SAP Business Technology Platform, Embedded Analytics med mera. Det innebr att fretag som anvnder SAP str infr helt nya utmaningar och mjligheter. Vill du vara med p denna resa?  

  

Vlkommen till oss p CGI!


**Your future duties and responsibilities:**
--------------------------------------------


I rollen som SAP-konsult fr du mjlighet att vara en viktig kugge i CGI:s leverans gentemot uppdragsgivare dr du ingr i ett team med kunniga och erfarna kollegor. Hr fr du mjlighet att hjlpa vra kunder att effektivisera och utveckla sina affrsprocesser och systemlsningar med hjlp av de mjligheter SAP som affrssystem ger.  

  

Vra uppdrag finns inom till exempel ECC, CRM, S/4HANA, S/4HANA Cloud, SuccessFactors och User Experience. Hr fr du mjlighet att arbeta inom svl implementationsprojekt, processfrbttringar och frvaltningsuppdrag inom olika branscher s som Insurance, Retail och Manufacturing.  

  

Vra kunder befinner sig p olika stadier i sina resor mot S/4HANA. En del befinner sig redan i den nya tekniken, ngra har en pgende frndringsresa och andra har nnu inte tagit steget till den nya SAP-plattformen. Hr kommer du spela en viktig roll i att guida vra kunder i deras frndringsresa.


**Required qualifications to be successful in this role:**
----------------------------------------------------------


Vi sker dig som redan r SAP-konsult eller har arbetat som SAP key user, och i rollen deltagit i eller drivit utvecklings- eller frndringsprojekt. Om du inte redan har arbetat med S/4HANA r det viktigt att du r nyfiken p det och vill gra en kompetensresa.  

  

Vi ser grna att du har fljande:  

Relevant hgskoleutbildning eller motsvarande  

Svenska och engelska obehindrad i tal och skrift  

  

Det r meriterande om du har erfarenhet eller ett brinnande intresse fr ett eller flera av fljande omrden:  

Masterdata  

Finance  

Plan  

Source  

Make  

Deliver  

Security  

Analytics  

Technology  

ABAP  

Business Tech Platform (BTP)  

Integration, SAP Cloud Platform Intergration (CPI)  

RPA  

Machine learning  

User Experience (Fiori, Neptune)  

  

**Mer information om tjnsten**  

Fr den hr rollen lgger vi stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper. Rollen som konsult innebr en omvxlande vardag dr du behver ha en frmga och drivkraft att bygga och utveckla goda relationer fr att skapa ett starkt samarbete. Fr att framgngsrikt kunna lsa utmaningar som du och ditt team stlls infr sker vi dig med ett analytiskt tnk och kreativ problemlsningsfrmga. Du br dessutom ha en affrsmssig instllning, ett stort eget driv och gilla utmaningar.  

  

CGI r ett av vrldens strsta oberoende tjnstefretag inom IT och affrsprocesser och vi har ett nra samarbete med SAP som Guldpartner. CGI har ven blivit utsedda till SAP Partner Of The Year de senaste tv ren och r en av de strsta SAP-leverantrerna p den svenska marknaden.  

  

**Vill du veta mer?**  

Vad bra! Sk till tjnsten redan nu d vi rekryterar lpande.  

  

#LI-JA1


**What you can expect from us:**
--------------------------------


**Lt oss som gare omvandla verklig insikt till handling tillsammans.**  

  

Livet p CGI bygger p gande, lagarbete, respekt och tillhrighet. Tillsammans med oss kommer du att kunna n din fulla potential.  

  

Du r inbjuden att ta gandeskap redan frn frsta dagen i vrt arbete med att frverkliga vr drm om att skapa en arbetsmilj dr vi trivs med att arbeta tillsammans och bidrar till framgngen fr vrt fretag. Det r drfr vi kallar oss CGI Partners snarare n anstllda. Vi drar nytta av vr kollektiva framgng och tillsammans fr vi mjlighet att aktivt forma vr fretagsstrategi och inriktning.  

  

Ditt arbete skapar vrde. Du kommer att vara med att utveckla innovativa lsningar och bygga relationer med medarbetare och kunder samtidigt som du fr tillgng till globala mjligheter att skala upp dina ider, omfamna nya mjligheter och dra nytta av gedigen bransch- och teknikexpertis.  

  

Du kommer att forma din karrir tillsammans med ett fretag som r byggt fr att vxa och best. Du fr std av ledare som bryr sig om din hlsa och ditt vlbefinnande och ger dig mjligheter att frdjupa dina kunskaper och vidga dina vyer.
  

  

Bli en del en av vrldens strsta leverantrer av IT- och affrskonsulttjnster.

title: Future Talent - HR & OHS Junior Analyst
description:
*At Tetra Pak we commit to making food safe and available, everywhere; and we protect what's good – protecting food, protecting people, and protecting the planet. By doing so we touch millions of people's lives every day.*

*And we need people like you to make it happen.*


***We empower you to reach your potential with opportunities to make an impact to be proud of – for food, people and the planet.***

  


**Job Summary**
---------------



Start your career development and become Tetra Pak’s next Future Talent! We are looking for highly motivated newly graduates to join us in 2025!

  


Future Talent Programme is a Trainee Program within Tetra Pak Global IM. We offer a permanent position starting in September 2025 at our site in Lund. You will onboard an individually designed development program for 12 months connected to a specific position and the Tetra Pak organization. During the program you will participate in trainings and job rotations throughout various parts of Tetra Pak’s IT organization to explore your potential and grow as a person. As a Trainee here with us, you will get to know our entire business and collaborate with colleagues all over the world. And this is just the beginning of your Tetra Pak career!

  


Visit https://www.tetrapak.com/about-tetra-pak/careers/future-talent and read more about Tetra Pak Future Talent Program!

  


Tetra Pak Global Information Management (Global IM) supports the Tetra Pak Group with all aspects of Information Management. We set the Information Management strategy and standards and work together with Tetra Pak’s Global Process Owners to automate our business processes making sure we run projects & services that provide the greatest value for Tetra Pak and our customers. Global IM has approx. 900 employees in four main sites: Chakan in India, Lund in Sweden, Denton in the USA and in Singapore. You will be based in Lund Sweden, but you will work in a global arena.


**What you will do**
--------------------



As our new Future Talent – HR & OHS Junior Analyst you will:


* Join a global team spread across six countries. Established in 2017, this team was created to support our HR IT systems, including the cloud solution SAP SuccessFactors.
* Over time, our services have expanded to support various HR applications, becoming a trusted partner in our journey towards HR digitalization.
* Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues related to HR systems.
* Provide technical support to HR users.
* Develop and maintain technical documentation for HR systems.
**We believe you have**
-----------------------


* Master's degree in Computer Science, Human Resources or a related field, expected to graduate in 2024 or 2025.
* Experience with HR processes, SAP SuccessFactors or similar HR applications is a plus.
* Proficiency in English, both written and spoken.
* Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.

Previous international studies or experience is considered meritorious.  
* 
**We Offer You**


* A variety of exciting challenges with ample opportunities for development and training in a truly global landscape
* A culture that pioneers a spirit of innovation where our industry experts drive visible results
* An equal opportunity employment experience that values diversity and inclusion
* Market competitive compensation and benefits with flexible working arrangements

  




**Apply Now**


If you are inspired to be part of our promise to protect what’s good; for food, people, and the planet, apply with your CV and Cover Letter in English through our careers page at https://jobs.tetrapak.com/.


This job posting expires on **2024-02-12.**


To know more about the position contact Margaretha Sveadotter at +46 46 36 2853 or Claes Björkeroth at +46 36 5925  

Questions about your application contact Josephine Malalla at +46 46 36 5253  

For trade union information contact Unionen Lisbeth Larsson at +46 46 36 2320 and Sveriges Ingenjörer Lars Haraldsson at +46 46 36 2533

  


*Diversity, equity, and inclusion is an everyday part of how we work. We give people a place to belong and support to thrive, an environment where everyone can be comfortable being themselves and has equal opportunities to grow and succeed. We embrace difference, celebrate people for who they are, and for the diversity they bring that helps us better understand and connect with our customers and communities worldwide.*
company_description: At Tetra Pak we like a good challenge, and our promise is to make food safe and available everywhere.
